title: “w00t” is not a word!
excerpt: [digg=http://www.digg.com/odd_stuff/w00t_is_not_a_word]This flat out sickens me: “‘w00t,’ an expression of joy coined by online gamers, was crowned word of the year on Tuesday by the publisher of a leading U.S. dictionary. Massachusetts-based Merriam-Webster Inc. said ‘w00t’ — typically spelled with two zeros — reflects a new direction in the American language led by a generation raised … more →
